Episode.name: actor
Episode.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Episode.name: partOfSeries
Episode.desc: The series to which this episode or season belongs.

Episode.name: trailer
Episode.desc: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

Episode.name: partOfSeason
Episode.desc: The season to which this episode belongs.

Episode.name: directors
Episode.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video games etc. content. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Episode.name: episodeNumber
Episode.desc: Position of the episode within an ordered group of episodes.

Episode.name: director
Episode.desc: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

Episode.name: productionCompany
Episode.desc: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

Episode.name: actors
Episode.desc: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.
